message.content: We refer to Wikipedia articles on medicine for help. Among the options, smoking is the strongest predisposing factor for osteopenia. Other factors, such as hypoparathyroidism and NSAID use, can also contribute to osteopenia but smoking has been shown to have the strongest association. Obesity, on the other hand, can actually have a protective effect against osteopenia.
